docs.snippet: Wayne Neville Morgan, who describes himself as the representative of a group of American corporations offering to lend the Government of Uruguay $130 million, said yesterday that the offer of his syndicate was still good.
docs.lead_paragraph: Wayne Neville Morgan, who describes himself as the representative of a group of American corporations offering to lend the Government of Uruguay $130 million, said yesterday that the offer of his syndicate was still good.
docs.abstract: W N Morgan, who describes self as repr of US corps, renews offer of $139 million, int, NYC; says group would probably withdraw offer if Govt sends new mission to NYC; says Uruguayan politicians sought his aid earlier in Montevideo; Govt rejects loan offer

headline.main: Lender Renews Bid to Uruguay But Montevideo Rejects It Again; LOAN TO URUGUAY REJECTED AGAIN

byline.original: Special to The New York Times

docs.snippet: Trading volume for sugar dropped to half the previous day's business yesterday. The range of prices was only five to seven points for world sugar compared with 30 points on Wednesday. The market, in short, was mixed and featureless.
docs.lead_paragraph: Trading volume for sugar dropped to half the previous day's business yesterday. The range of prices was only five to seven points for world sugar compared with 30 points on Wednesday. The market, in short, was mixed and featureless.

headline.main: Commodities: Volume in Sugar Drops Sharply in a Mixed and Colorless Market; PRICES ARE VARIED IN WAKE OF RISES Copper Futures Also Slow but Quotations Gain -- Soybeans in Demand

docs.snippet: LONDON, July 31 (UPI) -- The British Chamber of Shipping has voiced "renewed concern" following an alleged move toward flag discrimination for oil shipments by Colombia.

docs.abstract: Govt reptdly plans to reserve 50% of all shipments to and from abroad to Colombian-flag ships; Brit C of C voices concern

headline.main: COLOMBIAN SHIP BID SCORED BY BRITONS

docs.snippet: THERE are certain fringe benefits for the author of a successful play, like getting a good table at Sardi's. That one I knew about from the movies. But I didn't know and never suspected that Travel was another.

docs.snippet: LIMA, Peru, July 31 -- Three young men sat defiantly in their seats in the Paris movie theater this week while the rest of the audience stood and sang Peru's national anthem.

docs.snippet: A high-level mission representing the Government of Uruguay will meet today with a number of leading commercial banks here in an effort either to settle or recast an estimated $50 million of Uruguayan debt.

docs.snippet: A Uruguayan Government mission, here to negotiate the recasting of bank loans estimated at $50 million, failed yesterday to present its plan for refinancing the debt in the first session of renewed talks with the banks.
